about_the_game:
Land of Chasers: A Next-Level ARPG Roguelike Experience!

Dive into the heart-pounding action of Land of Chasers, an inventive TPS game in which you use an arsenal of powers and sword skills to face merciless robots. Explore dynamic areas, defeat foes, and acquire things to level up. Put your riches in chests strategically and race against the clock with a dramatic 5-minute countdown timer. Level up, unleash storm-like lightning strikes, and immerse yourself in an action-packed ARPG roguelike journey like no other. Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled battle in Land of Chasers!

Explore the ever-changing world of Land of Chasers, which is presently in Early Access. Participate in exciting playtests, help shape the game's fate with your feedback, and be an important part of our dynamic community-driven development process. Dive into the action, battle threatening robots, and explore the fascinating environments. Your feedback is important, and as we fine-tune every aspect, we're building a game that's not simply played, but lived. Join us in Land of Chasers, where the action is still unfolding and you're there in the middle of it!


Chapter One: Survive!

Survive at any cost and eliminate your opponents. Loot all items and place them in chests to gain xp. It's a movement.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Land of Chasers is a roguelike action RPG set on a growing planet. Join the group as they experience this adventure over time. Take part in exciting trial games while the game is still in creation, determine the game's fate with your feedback, and create dynamic, interactive landscapes.
